wordGroup: roller follower 滚子从动件；滚轮挺杆
cam follower 凸轮从动件；凸轮从动滚轮；挺杆；凸轮跟随器
follower motion 从动件运动规律；从动件停歇

sentences.en: She is a leader, not a follower.
sentences.cn: 她是领导者，不是追随者。

sentences.en: Now I want to say that I think that Shaffers is more of a follower than a leader in the coffee industry.
sentences.cn: 现在我想说，我认为 Shaffers 在咖啡行业中更像是一个追随者，而不是引领者。

sentences.en: She herself insists she is no slavish follower of fashion.
sentences.cn: 她坚称自己绝不是一个追随时尚的人。
